modules:
package main

doc := {"foo": {"a", "b", "c"}}

patch := [{"op": "remove", "path": "foo/b"}]

result := r if r = json.patch(doc, patch)

result.description: result obtained after consecutively applying all patch operations in `patches`
result.name: output

modules:
package main

doc := {"foo": {"a", "b", "c"}}

patch := [{"op": "add", "path": "foo/d", "value": "d"}]

result := r if r = json.patch(doc, patch)

result.description: result obtained after consecutively applying all patch operations in `patches`
result.name: output

modules:
package main

doc := {"foo": {"a", "b", "c"}}

patch := [{"op": "add", "path": "foo/d", "value": "e"}]

result := r if r = json.patch(doc, patch)

result.description: result obtained after consecutively applying all patch operations in `patches`
result.name: output

modules:
package main

doc := {"foo": {"a", "b"}, "bar": {"c", "d"}}

patch := [{"op": "move", "from": "foo/a", "path": "bar/a"}]

result := r if r = json.patch(doc, patch)

result.description: result obtained after consecutively applying all patch operations in `patches`
result.name: output

modules:
package main

doc := {[1]}

patch := [{"op": "add", "path": [[1], 1], "value": 2}]

result := r if r = json.patch(doc, patch)

result.description: result obtained after consecutively applying all patch operations in `patches`
result.name: output
